content.html: Overturning #RoeVWade will harm those with the fewest options e.g. who can’t afford to go out of state, who face domestic abuse. It will also be a pretext to remove other healthcare rights. This is why reproductive rights are a feminist, class, LGBTQ & racial justice issue.
content.value:
Overturning #RoeVWade will harm those with the fewest options e.g. who can’t afford to go out of state, who face domestic abuse.

It will also be a pretext to remove other healthcare rights.

This is why reproductive rights are a feminist, class, LGBTQ & racial justice issue.
